main.name: Ferry Hinardi
main.description: There are so many problem in the world and technology help to solve them. A person who have process, logic, and problem solving ability.
main.bio: Ferry Hinardi is a Software Engineer at Traveloka, I'm doing I'm doing some task regarding one of product in Traveloka apps using React and React Native. Before that, i ever become contribution of create some apps: Jaztip Apps, Maideasy Apps. I'd like doing research some new technology to improve myself. In the end, Technology is a tool that helps people to make some tasks simple and practical.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Basic ability that build new portfolio.

education.description: In Binus, I'm join IT Department which help me to face in workplace environment. At that time, i learn how to manage time between school and work.

work.title: Software Engineer - React Native
work.description: I'm worked to create new product that recently launch (Visa product). I'm develop using React Native and React Js for apps and web.

work.title: Front end Engineer
work.description: I'm worked to create new warehouse management system for this company, build new system for new startup company to increase optimization for delivery and stocking. I'm using React Js to build this system. Apart from that, I'm also contribute in customer facing apps that customer can order product from this apps.

projects.title: Jaztip
projects.category: The social-commerce marketplace in Indonesia. Buying and selling application where you can find seller info as well as requests for purchase of goods, and directly connect to the chat application of your choice

projects.title: Maideasy
projects.category: Maideasy is a homegrown Malaysian company that seeks to revolutionise the way we book part-time cleaners.

testimonials.text: It's not the technology that changes the world. It's the people using technology that changes the world.
Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them. The teacher is the most important.
